title: Teddy Bear Chair Wool/Deep Red
body: Be ready to be embraced by the great bear paws of this all time maximum comfort easy chair. Its unique design was inspired from Hans J. Wegner Classic Teddy Bear Chair back in 1951. The armrests resemble big bear paws ready to embrace you and make you feel loved. It is one of the most renowned designs because of the comfort and style that it can certainly give you.
